text: Matt Henderson (born June 22, 1974) is an American retired professional ice hockey player. He played in six National Hockey League games with the Nashville Predators and Chicago Blackhawks. ==Awards and honors== {| class="wikitable" ! Award ! title: Matt Henderson (ice hockey)
